knitpicks com 1 800 574-1323 serene waves throw change to mc repeat pattern for 11 row notes change to c2 take a deep relaxing breath and wrap yourself in the serene waves throw using a simple wave stitch and soft cotton yarn in repeat pattern for 11 row blocks of soft colors this project is perfect for a baby gift or for a change to mc lovely throw for yourself repeat pattern for 11 row one 100 gram skein makes up one stripe on the throw mix and match your favorite colors to create your own unique project change to c3 dc3tog repeat pattern for 11 row yo hook insert hook in st pull up a lp 3 lps on hook yo hook change to mc pull through 2 lps yo hook insert in next st pull up a lp 4 lps on hook yo pull through 2 lps 3 lps on hook yo insert hook in repeat pattern for 11 row next st yo pull up a lp 5 lps on hook yo draw through 2 lps fasten_off last st 4 lps left on hook yo draw through all 4 lps left on hook 3 sts finishing decreased weave in ends wash and block if desired serene waves
